title: Arvind, Saloni win gold
text:
Arvind, Saloni win gold Arvind, Saloni win gold October 11, 2015, Bengaluru, DHNS 
Arvind M and Saloni Dalal struck gold in record-breaking manner to steal the show on day two of the Karnataka State Senior Swimming Championships here on Saturday. Basavangudi Aquatics Centre’s Arvind was in blistering form as he pocketed the 100M backstroke title in 59.29 seconds, bettering the mark of 59.80 set by Rehan Poncha in 2011. Another BAC product Saurabh Vernekar won the silver in 1:06.93, while Global Swim Centre’s Hemanth Jenukal clinched the bronze medal in 1:07.97.In the women’s section, Pooja Aquatic Centre’s Saloni showed great composure and maturity to win the 50M breaststroke gold. Trailing BAC’s Charu Hamsini by split seconds in the initial stages of the race, the 13-year-old shifted gears in the final 15 metres to race ahead of the leader and clinch the yellow metal in 36.39 seconds.The win also saw the young sensation rewrite the State record — as old as her — set by Mrudula D of BAC in 2002. Charu had to settle for the silver in 36.43 seconds, while her team-mate Preethi T completed the podium in 37.94 seconds.Meanwhile, BAC’s Nishanth S raced his way to win the 200M breaststroke gold. Nishanth won the title in 2:29.38, a second better than the previous best of 2:30.34 set by Likith SP in 2014. His team-mate Pruthvik DS finished second in 2:38.79 while Manohar MP of Mangalore Aquatic Centre finished third in 2:45.9.Results: Men:50M freestyle:Prithvi M (BAC) 25.25, 1; Gaurav Yadav (Dolphin)25.50, 2; Vaishnav Hegde (Puttur)25.62, 3. 1500M freestyle:Md Yaqoob Saleem (Dolphin)17:19.09, 1; Sanjay CJ (Dolphin) 17:20.65, 2; Ruturaj P Indulkar (BAC) 17:27.98. 100M backstroke:Arvind M (BAC)59.29 (SR; Old: 59.80, Rehan Poncha, BAC, 2011) 1; Saurabh Vernekar (BAC)1:06.93, 2; Hemanth Jenukal (Global)1:07.97, 3. 50M breaststroke:Vaishnav Hegde (Puttur) 31.12, 1; Prithvi M (BAC)31.43, 2; Gaurav Yadav KA (Dolphin)31.87, 3. 200M breaststroke:Nishanth S (BAC)2:29.38 (State Record; Old: 2:30.34, LikithSP, BAC, 2014), 1; Pruthvik D S (BAC)2:38.79, 2; Manohar M P (Mangalore AC)2:45.9, 3. 100M butterfly:Avinash M (BAC)57.53, 1; Rakshith Shetty (BAC)58.40, 2; Vishawesh C Dudham (BAC)1:00.16, 3. 200M individual medley:Arvind M (BAC) 2:12.26, 1; Rakshith Shetty (BAC)2:14.50, 2; Hemanth Jenukal (Global)2:23.76, 3.Women:50M freestyle:Sneha T (BAC)28.63, 1; Harshitha J (BAC)29.75, 2; Avani Tantry (Pooja)29.91, 3. 1500M freestyle:Malavika V (BAC) 17:55.77, 1; Shraddha Sudhir (BAC) 18:52.16, 2; Preksha HM (BAC)19:01.73, 3. 50M breaststroke:Saloni Dalal (Pooja) 36.39 (SR; Old: 37.14, Mrudula D, BAC, 2002) 1; Charu Hamsini (BAC)36.43, 2; Preethi T (BAC)37.94, 3. 100M backstroke:Damini K Gowda (BAC)1:08.40, 1; Harishree Rai (Global)1:12.52, 2; Jhanati Rajesh (BAC)1:14.05, 3. 200M breaststroke:Harshitha Jayaram (Global)2:50.47, 1; Saloni Dalal (Pooja) 2:51.03, 2; Shriya R Bhat (BAC)2:57.61, 3. 100M butterfly:Damini K Gowda (BAC) 1:05.03, 1; Simran Mungekar (BAC)1:10.60, 2; Thanuja S (BAC)1:12.21, 3. 200M individual medley:Shraddha Sudhir (BAC)2:30.83, 1; Rhia Singh (BAC)2:37.78, 2; Avani Tantry (Pooja)2:42.52, 3.
